title: D.1 Matrices and Matrix Operations
content:
Section D.1

Matrices and Matrix Operations

Summary

Basic matrix algebra for algorithms.

Key Points

  • Matrix: m×n array of numbers
  • Addition: (A+B)ᵢⱼ = Aᵢⱼ + Bᵢⱼ
  • Multiplication: (AB)ᵢⱼ = Σₖ AᵢₖBₖⱼ
  • Identity I: AI = IA = A
  • Transpose: (Aᵀ)ᵢⱼ = Aⱼᵢ

Example

2×2 matrices: [a b; c d] × [e f; g h] = [ae+bg af+bh; ce+dg cf+dh].

Why It Matters

Matrix multiplication is fundamental operation in many algorithms.
